title: Portfolio Website (this website): React
description: I set up this website from a template I've made for simple React GHPages websites. It shares a similar layout to my other websites for Kraedt and Avalice.

title: Smart NAI: React, WebExtensions
description: A WIP FireFox extension (using React) specifically for NovelAI's image generation tool that makes managing prompts and tags a lot easier.

title: DAWProjectManager: Electron, React
description: An Electron app to make managing music production projects easier. It will search the filesystem for project files and store metadata next to it, and in the app you can tag and search for projects by tag or keyword.

title: BudgetWeb Redux: React, RxJS
description: An attempt at making a web-based budgetting app, modeled after EveryDollar, but with plans to add more functionality. This was also a workspace to learn more about React.

title: Accidental Cube Website: React
description: A rudimentary React website for my game development company "Accidental Cube" featuring my solo mobile game project "Avalice". The website can be viewed at https://accidentalcube.com/

title: Kraedt React Website: React, Google Cloud Functions
description: A React website for my music artist project "Kraedt". Data is fetched using a Google Cloud Function. The website can be viewed at https://kraedt.com/

title: MapleSource: C#, EFCore, .NET Sockets
description: A WIP MapleStory server source based heavily on HeavenMS. This is mostly a Java -> C# port. It is functional to a degree (you can login and traverse the maps).

title: MSDrops: ASP.Net MVC
description: A WIP website (using ASP.Net MVC / Razor) that references a database of monster drops in the game MapleStory to display drop chances for items.

title: Tonality: ASP.Net MVC
description: A ASP.Net MVC / Razor website I made as a group project in college, acting as a web store for music production plugins. You can filter store items by tags, review items, add items to your cart, manage your own profile, and send messages to other users.

title: HushNow MicMute: WPF
description: A very simple WPF microphone mute app that is very WIP.
